Few titles are more prized or noble than that of veteran of the United States. The sacrifice of these exceptional men and women has ensured our nation’s strength, security, and success from one generation to the next. Our veterans deserve our unending gratitude and reverence.

The Nord Stream 2 pipeline will expand Russian influence and threaten energy security throughout Europe. Since the Biden administration won’t hold Putin accountable, Congress must take action to ensure our NATO allies aren’t hostage to Russian energy.

But the Biden administration is planning to send $450,000 to migrants who crossed our border illegally and were deported. https://t.co/t09G52hNcm
The Build Back Better plan would do nothing to address inflation and other issues our country is facing—it would only make these issues worse. https://t.co/cNwdtwK5QH
Last night was a clear indication that the American people are disappointed, dissatisfied, and disgusted with the modern Democratic Party. https://t.co/Y5cmVg4Gw7

The Democrats are struggling to pass President Biden’s signature legislation. But instead of backing down and compromising, Democrats are making the bill even worse to appeal to their radical base. It won’t work.

The most expensive item in the Democrats entire bill is a tax cut for their wealthy donors. Lifting the SALT deduction will cost $475 billion, with more than $400 billion going directly to the top 5% of earners.

Democrats also included a provision that allows them to spy on Americans’ bank accounts. If your monthly deposits and withdrawals are greater than $600, they want access to your private account information.
Democrats are ending decades-old, bipartisan protections for religious preschools and child care centers that will pressure facilities to choose between federal funding and their faith.

The Build Back Better plan also sets aside billions to provide climate activists with government funded salaries, housing, and benefits to wage war on affordable energy sources that power the American economy.
“Equity”—the Democrats’ codeword for treating people differently based on race, gender, etc.—is used dozens of times. Including $2.5 BILLION for “tree equity.” “Equality” isn’t mentioned once.
The bill includes amnesty for millions of illegal aliens. This will encourage more people to break into the country and force Americans to compete with illegal immigrants for jobs.
Democrats can’t take a hint. They’ve insisted on adding more policies to their wasteful spending bill that would make it even worse for Americans. Let us count the ways.

I appreciate members of the Arkansas Farm Credit taking time to meet with me during their trip to Washington. I enjoyed our discussion about the supply chain and labor shortages across Arkansas. https://t.co/jh96TnVtg2

They apologized and claimed to ask for a refund.

Granting amnesty in any form hurts America’s working class. It forces Americans—especially recent legal immigrants—to compete with millions of illegal immigrants for lower wages. Democrats like Senator Bernie Sanders used to understand this. What happened, @SenSanders?
